channel.title: 317 P Ring help needed
channel.description: i have the p ring stats and i can pick it up in game but it only 1 hits for mele how would i go about making it 1 hit for range/mage too? codes/where to put them please..

item.title: 317 P Ring help needed

item.title: 317 P Ring help needed
item.dc:creator: @Mee0345 Mee0345
item.description:
@Mee0345 wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:6, topic:376264”][quote author=Clawz fury link=topic=472196.msg3453411#msg3453411 date=1293910690]

nope… i already had the stats set… thanks for trying come again

Your an idiot, what the person above said will work.
[/quote]
Range and mage max hits aren’t determined by items.cfg

Make sure you compile

You don’t need to compile after editing a configuration file.

@OP
You would have to alter the max hit methods, usually located in client class.[/quote]
Really? You dont have to compile when editing a .cfg? Wow… 2 Hours of my life wasted much?
Thanks for the heads up

Read full topic

item.title: 317 P Ring help needed
item.dc:creator: @rova1 rova1
item.description:
@rova1 wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:4, topic:376264”][quote author=demon fox337 link=topic=472196.msg3453249#msg3453249 date=1293901036]
nope… i already had the stats set… thanks for trying come again
[/quote]

Your an idiot, what the person above said will work.[/quote]

Lol that’s fail. Deathchaos is right (as usual)

For melee, a higher attack bonus increases the frequency of hits (hit more often) and higher strength bonus increases the max hit itself.
However, for ranged and magic, there is only an ‘attack’ bonus, these stats do not have a strength option therefore increasing the bonus (by using pring) only means accuracy - you won’t hit as many 0s but you can’t hit higher.

So how do you hit higher? Well for range attacks you hit harder at higher levels so go into your character file and manually edit your range level to a higher number (eg change 99 to 999) and that will make you hit harder

For magic, the max hit won’t change irrespective of bonus or level, once you unlock the ability to use a certain spell, you have it’s max hit. As a work around you can code a custom spell that’s casted by command and set your max hit yourself, an example being (…quick search…) a freeze command that ice barrages the target and damages them for 98:

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,447480.msg3284045.html#msg3284045 (works on players only)

Read full topic

@OP
